data.title: NFWdist: Density, distribution function, quantile function and random generation for the 3D NFW profile
data.name: NFWdist
data.description: Density, distribution function, quantile function and random generation for the 3D NFW profile

evidence: "This package lets you sample from the NFW as a true PDF with the only variable being the concerntration" (indicates an R package providing a statistical distribution implementation, typically used as a dependency).
"Load with: library(NFWdist)" (shows it is an R package intended to be loaded into other code, not a standalone application).
README is presented as a GitHub document with R code examples and no mention of CRAN or other registries, implying distribution via the GitHub source repository.
